shortdesc.ph: Sets whether to play external audio sources locally.
Sets whether to play external audio sources locally.
Sets whether to play the external audio source locally.
Sets whether to play the external audio source locally.

p.codeblock: Future<void> enableCustomAudioLocalPlayback( {required int trackId, required bool enabled});
public abstract int EnableCustomAudioLocalPlayback(uint trackId, bool enabled);

section.p: After calling this method to enable local playback of externally captured audio sources, you can call this method again and set enabled to to stop local playback. You can call to adjust the local playback volume of the custom audio capture track.

After calling this method to enable local playback of externally captured audio sources, you can call this method again and set enabled to to stop local playback. You can call to adjust the local playback volume of the custom audio capture track.

After calling this method to enable local playback of the externally captured audio source, to stop local playback, you can call this method again and set enabled to . You can call to adjust the local playback volume of the custom audio track.

After calling this method to enable local playback of the externally captured audio source, you can call it again and set enabled to to stop local playback. You can call to adjust the playback volume of the custom audio capture track locally.
section.note: Before calling this method, make sure you have called the method to create a custom audio capture track.
Before calling this method, make sure you have already called the method to create a custom audio capture track.
Before calling this method, make sure you have already called to create a custom audio track.
Before calling this method, make sure you have already called the method to create a custom audio capture track.

plentry.pd: Audio track ID. Set this parameter to the custom audio track ID returned by the method.

Whether to play the external audio source locally:
: Play locally.
: (Default) Do not play locally.
Audio track ID. Set this parameter to the custom audio track ID returned by the method.

Whether to play the external audio source locally:
: Play locally.
: (Default) Do not play locally.

Whether to play the external audio source locally:

: (Default) Do not play locally.
The audio track ID. Set this parameter to the custom audio track ID returned by the method.

Whether to play the external audio source locally:
: Play locally.
: (Default) Do not play locally.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
